title: Built With Next.js
text: Next.js, the React enterprise Framework for reliability, performant and better SEO websites

title: React.js
text: Gain headstart by building with React.js, build performant and scalable site with React.js

title: Easy to Customize with Sass
text: Bandicoot is built using Sass. Easily change colors, typography and much more. It is the most mature, stable, and powerful CSS extension language in the world.

title: Built With Bootstrap 5
text: Bandicoot is the powerful e-commerce front-end solution based on Bootstrap 5 - the worlds most popular responsive, mobile-first front-end component library.

title: 40+ Flexible Components
text: Besides styling all default Bootstrap 5 components Bandicoot introduces lots of new flexible, customizable and reusable elements you can use across the website.

title: Mobile Friendly Interface
text: It's not a surprise that nowadays over 70% of users shop online using their mobile devices. Bandicoot is 100% responsive and optimized for small touch screens.

title: Google Fonts
text: Bandicoot uses Google fonts which are free, fast to load and of very high quality. Currently Google fonts library includes 870+ font families to choose from.

title: Touch-enabled Sliders
text: In the era of touch screens its important to ensure great user experience on handheld devices, especially when it comes to such frequently used interface component as slider.

title: Vector Based HD Ready Icons
text: Bandicoot is equiped with font-based icon pack to ensure that infographics and interface icons look sharp on any device with any screen resolution and pixel density.

title: Typescript
text: Bandicoot core scripts as well as all dependencies are written in vanilla JS. And now with Bootstrap 5 we finally drops jQuery and uses ES6 modules.

title: Detailed Documentation
text: Download package includes links to online documentation. It covers all crucial information about how to get started, customize template and components usage.
